sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_CD , (G.GIS_ASSETS_CD || '-' || G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_CD_STR , G.GIS_ASSETS_NM , G.GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0) GIS_ASSETS_AR , G.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN , NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI,0) GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI , G.GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD , G.GIS_ASSETS_BLDDATE , TO_CHAR(G.GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT , G.GIS_ASSETS_RM , G.REG_USR , TO_CHAR(G.REGISTDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REGISTDT , G.UPD_USR , TO_CHAR(G.UPDTDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDTDT , G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_GROUP_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_INVSTMNT_MTHD , G.GIS_ASSETS_GIS_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR , G.DRW_LST_REGIST_YEAR , G.DRW_LST_SEQ , G.GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT , TO_CHAR(G.GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT , G.ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD , G.ERP_ASSETS_NO , G.ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ , G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN , G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_RSN , G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD , (G.GIS_ASSETS_AR * O.OLNLP) AR_OLNLP , NVL(O.OLNLP,0) OLNLP FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G , OLNLP_F O WHERE G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = O.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD = O.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = O.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD
TO_DATE(#sSearchDT#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN O.BEGIN_DT AND O.END_DT+1
G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#sGisAssetsCd#
G.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsNm# || '%'
ORDER BY G.GIS_ASSETS_AR DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G , OLNLP_F O WHERE G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = O.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD = O.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = O.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD
TO_DATE(#sSearchDT#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN O.BEGIN_DT AND O.END_DT+1
G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#sGisAssetsCd#
G.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsNm# || '%'
ORDER BY G.GIS_ASSETS_AR DESC

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(*),0), '999,999,999,999')) SUM_CNT , TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(S.AR_OLNLP),0), '999,999,999,999')) SUM_AR_OLNLP , TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(S.GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI),0), '999,999,999,999')) SUM_GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI FROM ( SELECT G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_CD , (G.GIS_ASSETS_CD || '-' || G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_CD_STR , G.GIS_ASSETS_NM , G.GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0) GIS_ASSETS_AR , G.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN , NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI,0) GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI , G.GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD , G.GIS_ASSETS_BLDDATE , TO_CHAR(G.GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT , G.GIS_ASSETS_RM , G.REG_USR , TO_CHAR(G.REGISTDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REGISTDT , G.UPD_USR , TO_CHAR(G.UPDTDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDTDT , G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_GROUP_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_INVSTMNT_MTHD , G.GIS_ASSETS_GIS_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR , G.DRW_LST_REGIST_YEAR , G.DRW_LST_SEQ , G.GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT , TO_CHAR(G.GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT , G.ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD , G.ERP_ASSETS_NO , G.ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ , G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN , G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_RSN , G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD , (G.GIS_ASSETS_AR * O.OLNLP) AR_OLNLP , NVL(O.OLNLP,0) OLNLP FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G , OLNLP_F O WHERE G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = O.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD = O.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = O.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD
TO_DATE(#sSearchDT#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN O.BEGIN_DT AND O.END_DT+1
G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#sGisAssetsCd#
G.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsNm# || '%'
ORDER BY G.GIS_ASSETS_AR DESC ) S
